category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: browserWindowMode
preference.preference_description: Determines how the browser window will be displayed (e.g. from QuickLinks open a weblink). Valid values are 1/2/3. 1 - Launch externally (default). 2 - Launch in a single internal browser window. 3 - Launch in a separate internal browser window.
